areyouhappy.message: Are you happy about Turn Off the Lights?

des1checkmotion.message: Make sure your room is not dark and that it has enough light.

des2checkmotion.message: Your camera must not receive direct sunlight.

des3checkmotion.message: You use a front facing camera.

desaddvideobutton.message: Show the add button from the YouTube video

desalllightsoff.message: Clicking the lamp button will toggle the lights on/off on all open tabs

desambilight.message: Show you the atmosphere lighting effect of the current playing video

desambilight4color.message: Four chosen colors around the video:

desambilightrangeblurradius.message: Lower values will sharpen the shadow, higher values will make them more blurred.

desambilightrangespreadradius.message: Positive values increase the size of the shadow, negative values decrease the size.

desambilightvarcolor.message: Extract the color from the video.

desatmosphereonly.message: Use the atmosphere lighting feature only the following video site:

desauroraplayer.message: The ambient lighting player is also available for your computer.

desautoplay.message: Automatically dim the background when you click the play button and vice versa

desautoplaydelay.message: Brighten the background again when the video has ended after

desautoplayonly.message: Dim only the following video site(s):

desautostop.message: Stop playing the video automatically when I open a web page

desautostoponly.message: Only activate stop playing the video automatically on the following site(s):

desbrowsersupport.message: Your browser doesn't support this feature yet. Make sure you have the latest browser version installed on your computer.

descammotiononly.message: Activate the Camera Motion only on the following site(s):

descontextmenus.message: Show the context menu to focus an item

description.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the videos as if you were in the cinema. Works for YouTubeâ„¢ and Beyond.

deseastereggs.message: Pressing the T key adds a theater curtain to the dark layer

desenterpassword.message: Enter your password in the box below:

deseyea.message: Automatically dim the background when opening a webpage

deseyealist.message: Automatically dim the background on the following site(s):

deseyen.message: Normal use (lights go out when you click on the lamp icon)

deseyetimesaver.message: When a page is inactive (no mouse or keyboard input) for the time specified below, it automatically goes dark.

deshardflash.message: Show all Flash objects, skipping the URL filter. This will fix problems with some video players being hidden, but will also display ads.

deshead.message: Show the YouTube Channel bar or the name

deshovervideo.message: Hover your mouse on the video element for certain number of seconds, after which the webpage automatically dims

desinfobar.message: Show the description information about the video

deslampandnightmode.message: Activate the 'Night Mode' option when you click on the gray lamp button

deslikebar.message: Show the like/dislike bar under YouTube videos

deslikebutton.message: Show the like & dislike buttons of YouTube for the video

desmobileapp.message: Turn Off the Lights is also available for your mobile device.

desmousespotlighta.message: When the lights are off, it shows a spotlight around the mouse cursor.

desmousespotlightc.message: Enable area selection to focus on an item when the lights are off

desmousespotlighto.message: Normal use (disables the mouse settings below)

desmousespotlights.message: Enable the screen shade, with the possibility to click on the hyperlinks

desmousespotlightt.message: Enable clicking hyperlinks when the screen is darkened

desnightactivetime.message: The switch will be visible between the following times:

desnightenabletheme.message: Automatically go to Night Mode when a new web page is opened

desnighthover.message: Shows a transparent switch on the web page

desnightonly.message: Activate the Night Mode only on the following site(s):

desnightowl.message: One click converts the page directly into a night theme with a clickable hyperlink. Click it again to return to normal view. Click the lamp button again to disable this feature.

desnighttheme.message: Show the night switch button below the web page to make the page dark or light

despassword.message: Require a password to be entered before turning the lights back on.

desplaylist.message: Show the YouTube playlist on the YouTube website

desreadera.message: Always show the dimness level bar when the lights go out

desreadern.message: Never show the dimness level bar

desreflection.message: Show the reflection effect on all videos

desregularuser.message: This is default and the regular setting for new users. When clicking the gray lamp button, this style will be applied to the current web page.

desscreenprotection.message: One click shades the page to a soothing orange color to decrease eye strain on all open tabs. Click the lamp button again to disable this feature.

dessharebutton.message: Show the share button of YouTube for the video

desspeech.message: When you enable this option, you can talk to the browser lamp and say the following commands:

desspeechonly.message: Activate Speech Recognition only on the following site(s):

dessuggestions.message: Show the suggestions of the YouTube website

destime.message: Lights off between the following hours:

destrymotion.message: That's just great, and best of all is that it works everywhere. Even on YouTube, News website, etc.

desvideoheadline.message: Show and invert the color of the video title

desvideotool.message: Show the toolbar below your screen to customize the current video player

desvideotoolonly.message: Activate the Video Tool Bar only on the following site(s):

desvideovolume.message: Control the volume of the current video player with a mouse scroll

desviewcount.message: Show the number of views for the video

desvisopacity.message: The opacity value of the audio visualization background

desvolumesteps.message: The number of levels for each 360Â° wheel scroll

helpautoplay.message: The 'Eye protection' is enabled. To use the below feature, disable the 'Eye protection' option.

helpeyeprotection.message: Enabling 'Eye protection' will automatically disable the 'Auto play' feature.

shortcuteyeprotection.message: to enable/disable the eye protection feature

shortcutopacity.message: to restore to the set darkness (opacity) setting

titel360youtube.message: Shows the full 360 degrees YouTube video in one frame

titelautowidthyoutube.message: Automatically set the YouTube player to the larger size

titelcinemaontop.message: Movie theater mode: it shows the 'lights off' layer only on the top of the window

titeldoesntwork.message: Turn Off the Lights doesn't work on this web page. Please try another page.

titeldownloadthemeupgrade.message: Add a dark theme to your browser to dress it up. The theme appears around the border of the browser.

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.

titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.message: This shows you the real time stock market information.

titeldownloadupgradepropermenubar.message: Adds back the black menubar on the Google website.

titeldownloadupgradezoom.message: Zooms in or out on web content using the zoom button for more comfortable reading.

titellampregular.message: Always show the lamp icon in the omnibox

titellampvideo.message: Show the lamp icon only if a video player is detected

titelpageaction.message: Hide the lamp icon in the omnibox

titelqualityyoutube.message: Automatically set the quality of YouTube videos

titelsupportatmos.message: Supports only the HTML5 <video> and YouTube HTML5 player. It also uses the GPU from your graphics card.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser

titelwikiatmos.message: Wiki about the Atmosphere Lighting feature

titleprofilealwaysscreentab.message: Always enabled for all open tabs

titleprofilescreenclick.message: Enable clicking hyperlinks when the screen is darkened

upgradecontexttitle.message: We have added some new features for you

vtoolalign.message: A button to center the video player in your browser window

vtoolfilter.message: A button to add a filter in the current video player

vtoolfullscreen.message: A button to set the video player to the full window size

vtoolreplay.message: A button to replay the current video player

vtoolscreenshot.message: A button to take a screenshot of the current video player

vtoolvisualization.message: A button for displaying the audio-visualization for the current video player

warningtextambilight.message: When unable to receive video data because of a website's security rule, the chosen solid color will be used instead.
